mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT room_size, room, bathroom, windows, light, floor, break, total_sum FROM remodeling_predict WHERE room_size = #{roomSize} AND room = #{room} AND bathroom = #{bathroom} ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO remodeling_result ( room_size, room, bathroom, u_id, address, ho, dong, windows, light, floor, break, total_sum ) SELECT room_size, room, bathroom, #{uId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address}, #{ho}, #{dong}, windows, light, floor, break, total_sum FROM ( SELECT room_size, room, bathroom, windows, light, floor, break, total_sum FROM remodeling_predict WHERE room_size = #{roomSize} AND room = #{room} AND bathroom = #{bathroom} ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
